body_html:
You are trying to open a compressed text-file, which doesn't work with a TFRecordReader.
Possible solutions would be, to save your data as TFRecord, or read your data with with a generator (of course, there are also other solutions.. )
body_text:
You are trying to open a compressed text-file, which doesn't work with a TFRecordReader.
Possible solutions would be, to save your data as TFRecord, or read your data with with a generator (of course, there are also other solutions.. )
body:
You are trying to open a compressed text-file, which doesn't work with a `TFRecordReader`.
Possible solutions would be, to save your data as [TFRecord](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/how_tos/reading_data/convert_to_records.py), or read your data with with a [generator](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/data/Dataset#from_generator) (of course, there are also other solutions.. )
